data.actual_result: Pressing the "Join the Call" button does nothing and you have to join the call via the voice modal at the bottom of the screen
data.expected_result: You join the call after pressing the "Join the Call" button
data.short_description: "Join the Call" button does not work in DMs
data.steps_to_repro: - Attempt to join the call via the blue "Join the Call" button - Observe if you join the call
